description:
'''The Linda Lindas''' is an American [[Rock music|rock]] band from Los Angeles. The all-female group comprises Bela Salazar, Eloise Wong, and sisters Lucia and Mila de la Garza.

The band formed in 2018, and took their name from ''[[Linda Linda Linda]]'', a Japanese film. After being noticed by director [[Amy Poehler]], they recorded the soundtrack for her film [[Moxie (film)|''Moxie'']], which was released in 2021. Later that year, they released the single "[[Racist, Sexist Boy]]", which went viral. [[Epitaph Records]] signed them shortly afterwards.

In 2022, they released their debut album, ''[[Growing Up (The Linda Lindas album)|Growing Up]]'', and received mostly positive reviews.
